alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:01PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 445 PM PDT... At 401 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy 74 Between Hemet And Mountain Center, or 8 miles southeast of Hemet, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hemet, Idyllwild-Pine Cove, Hwy 243 Between Banning And Idyllwild, San Jacinto, southeastern Beaumont, Valle Vista, East Hemet, Mountain Center, Hwy 74 Between Hemet And Mountain Center, Menifee, Aguanga, Sage, Saboba Indian Reservation, Winchester, and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
